gameDetails.name: Galaxy Trucker: Even-Steven Cards
gameDetails.description:
This limited expansion consist of 5 new bonus cards for Galaxy Trucker: Another Big Expansion.  Each Even-Steven card gives a player a handicap or advantage, allowing for a more balanced game between players of different skill levels.

These cards are:

Surcharge / Discount
Drain / Source
Disgrace / Glory
Weakness / Strength
Slow Start / Head Start
